mapper.insert: insert into chat (seller_id, buyer_id, used_book_id) values (#{seller_id}, #{buyer_id}, #{used_book_id})
mapper.select: SELECT c.chat_id, #{user_id} AS user_id, CASE WHEN c.seller_id = #{user_id} THEN buyer.user_nickname ELSE seller.user_nickname END AS chat_partner_nickname, CASE WHEN c.seller_id = #{user_id} THEN buyer.user_img ELSE seller.user_img END AS chat_partner_img, ( SELECT cm.content FROM chat_message cm WHERE cm.chat_id = c.chat_id ORDER BY cm.message_created_at DESC LIMIT 1 ) AS last_message_content, ( SELECT cm.message_created_at FROM chat_message cm WHERE cm.chat_id = c.chat_id ORDER BY cm.message_created_at DESC LIMIT 1 ) AS last_message_time FROM chat c LEFT JOIN users buyer ON c.buyer_id = buyer.user_id LEFT JOIN users seller ON c.seller_id = seller.user_id WHERE c.seller_id = #{user_id} OR c.buyer_id = #{user_id};
